tests.name: test least with numeric types
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT1 (ID BIGINT KEY, I1 INT, I2 INT, I3 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic_1', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM INPUT2 (ID BIGINT KEY, B1 BIGINT, B2 BIGINT, B3 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic_2', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM INPUT3 (ID BIGINT KEY, DE1 DECIMAL(9,3), DE2 DECIMAL(9,3), DE3 DECIMAL(9,3)) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic_3', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM INPUT4 (ID BIGINT KEY, DO1 DOUBLE, DO2 DOUBLE, DO3 DOUBLE) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic_4', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT1 AS SELECT ID, LEAST(I1, I2, I3, null, 5) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT1;
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT2 AS SELECT ID, LEAST(B1, B2, B3, null) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT2;
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT3 AS SELECT ID, LEAST(DE1, DE2, DE3, null) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT3;
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT4 AS SELECT ID, LEAST(DO1, DO2, DO3, null) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT4;

tests.name: test implicit casting to long
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, N1 INT, N2 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, LEAST(N1, N2) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'least' does not accept parameters (INTEGER, BIGINT).

tests.name: test implicit casting to decimal
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, N1 INT, N2 BIGINT, N3 DECIMAL(50,30)) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, LEAST(N1, N2, N3) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'least' does not accept parameters (INTEGER, BIGINT, DECIMAL(50, 30)).

tests.name: test implicit casting to double
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, N1 INT, N2 BIGINT, N3 DECIMAL(30,18), N4 DOUBLE) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, LEAST(N1, N2, N3, N4, null) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

tests.name: test least with strings
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, S1 STRING, S2 STRING, S3 STRING, S4 STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, LEAST(S1, S2, S3, S4, null, null, 'hello') AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT2 AS SELECT ID, LEAST('"', S1) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT3 AS SELECT ID, LEAST('\foo"', S1) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

tests.name: test decimal widening
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, N1 DECIMAL(9,2), N2 DECIMAL (7,6)) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, LEAST(N1, N2) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

tests.name: test all null input
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, least(null, null, null, null) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'least' does not accept parameters (null, null, null, null)

tests.name: test no parameters
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID STRING KEY) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, LEAST() AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

tests.name: test trying to compare numeric and string
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID STRING KEY, NUM INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, LEAST(ID, NUM) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'least' does not accept parameters (STRING, INTEGER).

tests.name: test trying to call least(*)
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID STRING KEY, NUM INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT LEAST(*) AS LOWEST FROM INPUT;
